statements: DELETE FROM emissions_data WHERE industry_id = 1 AND region_id = 2;
DELETE FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_year > 2015 AND carbon_emission < 100;
DELETE FROM emissions_data WHERE industry_id = 1 AND region_id = 2;
DELETE FROM emissions_data WHERE carbon_emission > 1000 AND methane_emission < 500 AND nitrous_oxide_emission BETWEEN 200 AND 500;
DELETE FROM greenhouse_emissions WHERE region = 'Europe' AND emission_value > 1000;
DELETE FROM emission_sources WHERE emission_value < 5000 OR source_name = 'Coal Power Plant';
DELETE FROM emissions WHERE emission_quantity > 100 AND emission_date < '2023-01-01';
